thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com | 269 2
thread.title: Hbreeze8218

author: Hbreeze8218
title: Hbreeze8218
text: I think this is a wonderful app. The only thing I think sellers should change is when the sell out of a certain color/style of something, they should post a comment below that item specifying what they have in stock. My last purchase was a headache only because I thought there was certain color of something when there wasn't. So I had to get a refund n wait a few days on my money in then try in find more of what I needed. Would have saved me the headache if In the comments stated what they had in stock!!!
